text:
Curtis DuBois Fuller (born December 15, 1934) is an American jazz trombonist. He is known as a member of Art Blakey's Jazz Messengers and works to many classic jazz recordings.
Fuller continues to perform and record, and is a faculty member of the New York State Summer School of the Arts (NYSSSA) School of Jazz Studies (SJS).

annotations.surface_form: New York State Summer School of the Arts
